Package com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.db.datasource

Class AbstractDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.db.datasource.AbstractDataSource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyDataSource, OneConnectionDataSource, TomcatDataSource
    public abstract class AbstractDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    Class AbstractDataSource is a stub for all classes that implement DataSource interface. Contains following fields: database credentials, database driver, logger, and logger messages.
